title: If You Train Them Up, Even Trash Skills Are Pretty Useful! - Novel Updates
tags: Child Protagonist   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Quirky Characters   Special Abilities
author: Aiiromonpe   アイイロモンペ
description:
This story takes place in a strange world that’s not the earth as we know it. In this world, there are a few so-called Trash Skills that are looked down on.

Our protagonist is an eight-year-old girl who lives on her own named Marron, who discovers that there is a way to make the horribly disgusting Trash Skill Fruit actually taste good.

While nobody else would even think of eating a Trash Skill Fruit, Marron – her discovery in hand – kept on eating them, until her ‘useless’ Trash Skills became something incredible.

All the while, she’s yanked around by a fairy with a superiority complex named Alto and a problematic Japanese boy named Tarō who’s transported to her world.

Despite that, Marron’s a girl who likes to go at her own pace. This is her adventure!>
